an5.113:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing five qualities, a bhikkhu is incapable of entering and dwelling in right concentration. What five? Here, a bhikkhu cannot patiently endure forms, sounds, odours, tastes, and tactile objects. Possessing these five qualities, a bhikkhu is incapable of entering and dwelling in right concentration.
an5.113:2: "Bhikkhus, possessing fiveotherqualities, a bhikkhu is capable of entering and dwelling in right concentration. What five?Here, a bhikkhu can patiently endure forms, sounds, odours, tastes, and tactile objects. Possessing these five qualities, a bhikkhu is capable of entering and dwelling in right concentration."
